Online event: February 1, 2022

This event has taken place. You can now watch it on-demand.

After careful consideration of the unfolding situation, we decided to move all of our World Tour stops to regional virtual spaces. The agenda for the London online event is still packed full of unmissable talks, only the medium changed.

The future of commerce is product-to-consumer (P2C) management. Register for the P2C World Tour in London and prepare to be inspired to radically rethink your commerce. Hear experts from OMD EMEA, Digimasters, Sales Layer, N Brown, Constellation, and Productsup explain how to create sustainable commerce success.

Agenda

  • 10:00 - 10:20 GMT - P2C introduction and market outlook - Christian Reichert, Productsup
  • 10:20 - 10:35 GMT - Keynote - Adam Nagus, Digimasters
  • 10:35 - 10:55 GMT - Customer insights, Mike Kindon and Chris Sheridan, N Brown
  • 10:55 - 11:20 GMT - Analyst perspective - Ray Wang, Constellation
  • 11:20 - 11:50 GMT - Panel discussion - Dominika Wynne, OMD EMEA | Mark Symons, Sales Layer
  • 11:50 - 12:00 GMT - Wrap-up and Q&A

The P2C World Tour is tailored to 6 regions across the globe. View all the locations here.

Watch on-demand

By registering, you agree to Productsup’s Privacy Policy.

Three reasons to join the P2C World Tour:

  • Hear what the latest research reveals about the future of commerce
  • Discover how major brands are combating commerce anarchy
  • Learn why a product-to-consumer strategy is essential for success and how to realize it

Speakers

    • Dominika Wynne

      Director Performance Media

      OMD EMEA

      After working with Europcar, ODEON, Sony Pictures and easyJet, Dominika is now the Performance Director at OMD EMEA leading the Levi’s account. Passionate about e-commerce growth, automation and creative problem solving, she is driving digital agenda for Levi’s. She manages the complexities of online DTC advertising delivering on aggressive growth targets, new customer acquisition and market expansion. She is the lead across many paid media projects, including feed improvements and optimisations roadmap across paid media native platforms using ProductsUp technology at scale.

    • Adam Nagus

      Chief Data Officer

      Pearson

      Adam has been working in Digital and Analytics for over 18 years. He is the founder of the Visual Analytics capability for a number of the largest digital consultancies, including Accenture Digital and FTI Consulting. After Accenture, Adam founded a dedicated company that focused on Digital Delivery called Digimasters which was later acquired by FTI Consulting. With his wide industry experience, Adam’s latest challenge is focused on transforming a 200 year old British brand into a leader in digital learning, content and technology as the Chief Data Officer for Pearson PLC.

    • Ray Wang

      Principal Analyst and Founder

      Constellation

      R “Ray” Wang is the CEO of Silicon Valley based Constellation Research Inc,, He co-hosts DisrupTV, a weekly enterprise tech and leadership webcast that averages 50,000 views per episode and blogs at www.raywang.org.  His ground-breaking best selling book on digital transformation, Disrupting Digital Business, was published by Harvard Business Review Press in 2015. Ray's new book about Digital Giants and the future of business titled, Everybody Wants to Rule The World will be released July 2021. Wang is well quoted and frequently interviewed in media outlets such as the Wall Street Journal, Fox Business, CNBC, Yahoo Finance, Cheddar, and Bloomberg.

    • Mike Kindon

      Head of Web Operations

      N Brown

      Mike Kindon has been in the Ecommerce arena within Retail and Travel for over 18 years, working for Mamas and Papas, Royal Caribbean, The Co-operative Travel and the Littlewoods Shop direct group.

    • Chris Sheridan

      Party Configurations & Production Support

      N Brown

      Chris Sheridan has over 6 years experience in the IT industry as a contractor for Microsoft and T-Mobile, with 3 years working in Ecommerce at N Brown.

    • Mark Symons

      Enterprise Account Executive

      Sales Layer

      Mark is an Enterprise Account Executive for Sales Layer across UK and US markets. With over 20 years of Ecommerce software experience within analytics and customer experience, he is now focused on the value PIM solutions provide in dealing with complex product catalogues in a multi channel world.

    • Christian Reichert

      CSO

      Productsup

      As Chief Sales Officer, Christian Reichert is responsible for leading Productsup’s sales team and overseeing business development initiatives to accelerate sales growth. Christian previously led Productsup’s sales teams in Europe as Senior Vice President of Sales, EMEA, before being promoted to CSO. He has nearly a decade of experience in enterprise sales with high-growth technology companies, like Salesforce and Google. Christian studied Business and Economics in Maastricht and Hong Kong and he’s an avid rock climber.
